taskDescription:
A high school has 960 students. The ratio of students to high school teachers is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>16</mn>
  <mo>:</mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">16:1</annotation></semantics></math>. How many high school teachers are at the school?
